other_tests.findings: Corneal edema, granular subepithelial opacities, keratic precipitates, anterior chamber inflammatory cells, rubeosis iritis, posterior synechiae, iris bombe, and elevated intraocular pressure.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The intraocular pressure of the right eye decreased to the mid-teens after surgery. Vision improved to 15/20 in the right eye and 20/20 in the left eye following treatment.

other_tests.findings: Noncaseating granulomatous infiltration with epithelioid cells and lymphocytes; a few giant cells were also observed.
Nonspecific inflammation; dilated vessels filled with neutrophils, no giant cells or epithelioid cells observed.
R334W mutation in the CARD15/Nod2 gene confirmed in both the proband and his sister, wild type in the mother.
